Resolved Question Show me another » Umm condoms, help please? OKay me and my boyfriend are going to have sex. Hes 15 and im 14, now dont bother to be like oh your too young bah blah blah we are sweethearts and we love eachother. It was both our decision. Where can i buy condoms and how much? will they let me buy them> 4 years ago Report Abuse by bailezra Member since: 22 February 2008 Total points: 35,983 (Level 7) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Yes, you can buy condoms.
But if you are really intent on having sex, might I recommend that the two of you pay a visit to Planned Parenthood for a consultation before you do anything? They can educate you about the different forms of birth control that are available, teach you how to use condoms properly, and teach you how to take responsibility for your own body. They usually have free condoms, as well.
I do think that 14 is too young, but I doubt anything anyone says here will convince you of that, even the pregnant 14 year-olds. So if you are determined to have sex with your boyfriend, please make sure you are on reliable birth control and that you know how to use it. 4 years ago Report Abuse 40% 2 Votes 10 people rated this as good
